segments.text: What qualities do you think a senior executive should possess ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Generally speaking , he needs creativity , the ability to communicate , sense of personal responsibilities , the ability to solve problems and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have all these qualities ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have all of them . I am totally competent to be a senior executive .
segments.speaker: S2
